M

MultiTenant - Annotation Type in grails.plugin.multitenant.core.annotation
Domain classes annotated with this plugin will get a tenantId property added during compilation.
MultiTenantAST - Class in grails.plugin.multitenant.core.ast
Adds a tenantId property to domain classes annotated MultiTenant.

MultiTenantContext - Class in grails.plugin.multitenant.core
This class was created to get rid of TenantUtils and make some other classes independent of grailsApplication.

MultiTenantDomainClass - Interface in grails.plugin.multitenant.core

T

Tenant - Interface in grails.plugin.multitenant.core
Most applications will have one domain class implementing this interface and the getTenantId method will most likely return the database generated id to allow for fast lookups from second level cache.
